name: You and the Autumn Breeze (WIP)
description:
You and the Autumn Breeze is a short, kinetic visual novel that is currently a work-in-progress.

Diana is busy preparing treats for the upcoming Hallow's Eve, until she meets Lilith, an incredibly shy witch that she has never met before. Perhaps a new witch moving in?

Current Status:

  • Main story is about 75% done.
  • Sprites for side characters + CGs are yet to be done.

----

Credits:

Code/Story/Art: Stingraye

Music: https://www.purple-planet.com
